spells.name: Banshee Blast
spells.description: Cone deals 1d4 per level and panics creatures.

spells.name: Sonic Form
spells.description: Turn yourself into a creature of semisolid sound.

spells.name: Spellcrash
spells.description: Target loses a 5th-level prepared spell or spell slot.

spells.name: Whip of Ants
spells.description: Create a whip made of army ants.
